entries.quest_location_d: 'Just beyond the Bright Jewel Ribbon lies the home of the Black Sun. In the shadow of the Sanguinus Veil Nebula, the Scarlet Dawn Quadrant bespeaks danger to the unskilled. It makes me nervous being this close. My time in the Bright Jewel Ribbon will be chaotic indeed.'
entries.quest_patrol_d: 'It concerns the Car'das that the Black Sun have been so quiet lately. They fear that our enemies are planning something big. Could they target the Nova Orion? Not on my watch. It is my duty to patrol the Bright Jewel Ribbon and report anything unusual.'
entries.split_quest_alert: Aleas Rans'ery: <Pilot! The Black Sun have launched an attack on one of our Car'das check points. Get there immediately and fight them off!>
entries.title: The Bright Jewel Ribbon
entries.title_d: 'Named after the Bright Jewel System, home to the planet of Ord Mantell, the Bright Jewel Ribbon is a sliver of safety just beyond the Nova Orion. It lies uncomfortably close to the hostile borders of the Scarlet Dawn Quarter, home to the Black Sun. Yet, I am here, in the face of danger, awaiting my orders. I must patrol the Ribbon and report anything unusual. The Black Sun have stopped their attacks and the Car'das are concerned. Are they planning something big? After completing this mission, I should return home.'
